textBeforeTable: Track Listing On Director's Cut, Kate revisits a selection of tracks from her albums The Sensual World and The Red Shoes. She has re-recorded some elements while keeping the best musical performances of each song - making it something of a director's cut but in sound, not vision. All the lead vocals and drums are new performances, some of the tracks feature guests including Steve Gadd, Danny Thompson and, on backing vocals, Mica Paris. Three songs have been completely re-recorded, one of which is "This Woman's Work."
